Package com.shiroyama.chess2.arena

package com.shiroyama.chess2.arena
The arena package contains classes for managing combat between chess pieces.

This package is part of the Chess2 game and provides functionality for:

  • Managing combat state between attacking and defending pieces
  • Handling projectile creation, movement, and collision detection
  • Processing combat outcomes based on piece health points

The main classes in this package are:

  • Arena - Manages the combat area where pieces fight
  • Projectile - Represents projectiles fired by chess pieces
